paragrafi.codicePlSql:
select a.name,a.id,c.name,c.id,b.name,b.value,c.status from request a , detail b ,action c 
where b.root_id=a.root_id and 
b.value ='P1135357074' and b.name='id_billing_account_rc'
and c.request_id=a.id

paragrafi.nomeParagrafo: Estrazione messaggio di fault a partire dalle action fallite associate ad un certo account
paragrafi.codicePlSql:
select a.* from fault a, fault_doc b 
where b.id=a.document_id 
and a.action_id  in 
(
select c.id from request a , detail b ,action c 
where b.root_id=a.root_id and 
b.value ='P1135357074' and b.name='id_billing_account_rc'
and c.request_id=a.id
and c.status='FA'
)
